tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Veerendra is one of the most experienced doctor I would personally recommend. I had a disc slip in my cervix way back in 2014. I wasn't aware of his existence. So when I went to Mythri Hospital in Chandanagar, I was referred to him. He made an excellent diagnosis and started with step by step medication. Though I had an acute pain however he didn't jump into conclusion that it was a disc slip. Through step by step medication he diagnosed the right problem and made me cure in 2 months. My condition was serious when I first met him. However he didn't hurry up. Instead he did a thorough diagnosis to identify the root cause of the problem and got me recover. My friends who had similar cases ended up in surgery which I didn't. Today also I refer my family and friends to him for any orthopedic issues. My sincere gratitude and heartfelt thanks to him for being always available to take care of us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for my husband's treatment. He had a sport's injury while playing badminton. I really liked the doctor's style of prescription...it's a very detailed format for a layman person like us. We visit the same doctor at Apollo every time we face a musculoskeletal issue. His explanation beyond the cause of the spine issue was very informative. His patience is well attributed. I wish he doesn't leave apollo üòä cos apollo Kondapur is quite accessible for me anytime. Please anyone having any issue related to spine and other musculoskeletal reasons can visit him within his mentioned hours. Thank you Sir.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words

review:
-Patiently listened to my Grand mother's problem and explained the medication 
-Didn't suggest costly and complex medication unlike many other doctors
-It was a refreshing experience visiting a hospital and coming back with confidence instead of worrying about the problem
